TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputText extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputText Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputText = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 和 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML and elements on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件创建允许用户输入文本或密码的单行文本框。Use the control to create a single-line text box that allows the user to enter text or a password. 属性指定可在文本框中输入的最大字符数。The property specifies the maximum number of characters that can be entered in the text box. 属性允许您指定文本框的宽度。The property allows you to specify the width of the text box. 若要确定用户在文本框中输入的值，请使用 属性。To determine the value entered by the user into text box, use the property. 控件提供了一个 事件，该事件在 属性在向服务器的各次发送过程中的值更改时引发。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个在每次引发事件时执行一组自定义指令的事件处理程序。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 控件不提供回发到服务器的内置方式。The control does not provide a built-in way to post back to the server. 您必须在支持向服务器发布的网页（如控件）上提供另一个控件 ，以便将控件的值发送回服务器。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the value of the control back to the server. 若要创建多行文本框，请使用 控件。To create a multi-line text box, use the control. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 控件获取用户输入。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to get user input. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/CS/htmlinputtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/VB/htmlinputtextvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化 使用默认值的控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using default values. 它将创建一个 `text` 类型文本框控件。It creates a `text` type text box control. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Text" 文本字符串。The "text" literal string.| ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor/CS/htmlinputtextctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor/VB/htmlinputtextctorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的输入控件类型初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified input control type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可 使用指定的输入控件类型创建并初始化控件的新实例。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the control using the specified input control type. 它允许您创建特定类型的文本框控件，例如 `password` 。It allows you to create a specific type of text box control, such as `password`. 目前仅 `password` `text` 支持或类型。Only the `password` or `text` type is currently supported. 此构造函数旨在允许您创建其他文本框类型（如果有）。This constructor is designed to allow you to create other text box types if they become available. 下表显示了实例的初始属性值 。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |propertiesProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`type` 参数的值。The value of the `type` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 尽管可以使用此构造函数创建 `text` 类型文本框控件，但通常会改用无参数的构造函数。Although you can use this constructor to create a `text` type text box control, the parameterless constructor is commonly used instead. ## Examples [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor2/CS/htmlinputtextctor2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextCtor2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextCtor2/VB/htmlinputtextctor2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查控件的回发值是否 不同于其以前的值，如果是，则返回 `true` 。The method checks to see whether the postback value of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, returns `true`. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

span.span: An that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 呈现控件之前调用方法 。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 方法主要由控件开发人员用来扩展控件的功能 。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它将 自定义服务器控件中的属性设置为30个字符 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that it sets the property to 30 characters in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputTextOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputtext_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: An that contains event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当服务器上的属性更改时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新网页上的标签，以显示输入到 HTML 元素中的文本值 `` 。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the text entered into the `` HTML element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/CS/htmlinputtextserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputTextServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputTextServerChange/VB/htmlinputtextserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the event is correctly raised.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当服务器上的属性更改时，将引发事件 。The event is raised when the property is changed on the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 自定义事件处理程序更新网页上的标签，以显示输入到 HTML 元素中的文本值 `` 。The custom event handler updates a label on the Web page to display the value of the text entered into the `` HTML element. summary.span: 获取或设置文本框的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the contents of the text box.

value.span: 包含在文本框中的文本。

span.span: The text contained in the text box.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性以编程方式确定用户在文本框中输入的文本。Use the property to programmatically determine the text entered by the user into the text box. 你还可以使用此属性为文本框提供默认文本。You can also use this property to provide default text for the text box. > [!NOTE] > 如果为类型控件指定值，则该值 `password` 将不会显示在文本框中。If you specify a value for a `password` type control, that value is not displayed in the text box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以 编程方式确定用户在文本框中输入的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically determine the text entered by the user in the text box. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/CS/htmlinputtextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputText/VB/htmlinputtextvb.aspx#1)]
